document_data.name: ''Potion of Restoration''
document_data.othernames:
''Potion of Lesser Restoration''
''Greater Restoration Potion''
''Lesser Restoration Potion''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of restoration''''' were invaluable magic [[potion]]s that restored lost life energy, popular among adventurers dealing with powerful [[undead]] and [[cleric]]s of [[Lathander]].
document_data.Description:
[[File:Lesser Restoration Potion.png|thumb|''A bottle of lesser restoration potion.''|130x130px]]
''Potions of restoration'' were usually dispensed in small crystal phials. The liquid itself appeared murky when inside the phial but began to gently glow when brought close to a living creature.
document_data.Powers:
[[File:Greater Restoration Potion.png|thumb|''A bottle of greater restoration potion from the [[Ten-Towns]].''|130x130px]]
''Potions of restoration'' came in three power levels, regular, ''lesser restoration''. When consumed, these potions restored the imbiber's life force and ability drained by the creatures of the ''[[negative energy]]''.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Nazrym]] - a minor cleric of [[Bane]] involved in the [[Zhent]] invasion of [[Shadowdale]] in the [[1375 DR|Year of Risen Elfkin, 1375 DR]].
*[[Vhazror]] - an [[orc]] champion of [[Gruumsh]] in [[Thar]] in [[1372 DR]].
